thread.title: DoubleTree by Hilton opens its first hotel & spa in Liverpool
thread.title_full: DoubleTree by Hilton opens its first hotel & spa in Liverpool

author: eTN Global Editor
title: DoubleTree by Hilton opens its first hotel & spa in Liverpool
text:
DoubleTree by Hilton opens its first hotel & spa in Liverpool   Hotel exterior from Dale Street   
LONDON & MCLEAN, VA - DoubleTree by Hilton today celebrated the opening of its first hotel & spa in Liverpool, which is housed in the Municipal Annexe building, a unique, recently-restored Grade II listed building in the heart of the city. The Hilton Worldwide upscale brand now boasts more than 25 locations across the UK. 
Steeped in history, the stylish property has been given a contemporary finish while retaining all the grandeur of the original construction which dates back to 1865. 
The hotel opening marks the arrival of the second eforea spa in the UK. 
Terence Southward, general manager, DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel & Spa Liverpool, said, “The hotel is truly unique in that it combines 19th century splendor with the contemporary vibrancy of a 21st century hotel.”
